title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 22.4 - Time of valuation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 22.4 - Time of valuation

State Regulations

At least once during each three-month period, investments
shall be valued by the trust investment committee. The intervals between
valuation dates shall be substantially equal. Any valuation shall be filed as a
permanent record of the common trust fund within a reasonable period after the
valuation date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
22.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
